languages.text: "Бессердечный" — это вражеский флагман. Его осквернили нечеловеческими технологиями, но вам под силу очистить его от ксеносской мерзости и вернуть на службу Империуму. Даже если вы не пожелаете владеть бывшим пиратским судном, покупатели выстроятся в очередь за ним".

"The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."
languages.original_text: "Бессердечный" — это вражеский флагман. Его осквернили нечеловеческими технологиями, но вам под силу очистить его от ксеносской мерзости и вернуть на службу Империуму. Даже если вы не пожелаете владеть бывшим пиратским судном, покупатели выстроятся в очередь за ним".

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless is a flagship modified with inhuman technology. Capacious, fast, well-defended. Even if you don't wish to use a ship outfitted with xenotech, it is worth a fortune."
"The Heartless is a flagship modified with inhuman technology. Capacious, fast, well-defended. Even if you don't wish to use a ship outfitted with xenotech, it is worth a fortune."
"The Heartless is a flagship modified with inhuman technology. Capacious, fast, well-defended. Even if you don't wish to use a ship outfitted with xenotech, it is worth a fortune."

"The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

"The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

languages.text: «La Desalmada es la nave insignia del enemigo. Ha sido corrompida por una tecnología inhumana, pero usted dispone de los recursos necesarios para purgarla de esa inmundicia xenos y devolverla al servicio del Imperium. Y aunque no desee conservar una nave previamente capitaneada por piratas, seguro que hay muchos compradores potenciales deseando quitársela de las manos».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

traits.locale_text: «La Desalmada es la nave insignia del enemigo. Ha sido corrompida por una tecnología inhumana, pero usted dispone de los recursos necesarios para purgarla de esa inmundicia xenos y devolverla al servicio del Imperium. Y aunque no desee conservar una nave previamente capitaneada por piratas, seguro que hay muchos compradores potenciales deseando quitársela de las manos».

languages.text: “无心号是敌人的旗舰，遭到了异形技术的腐蚀。不过，您的王朝有足够的资源，可以将那些异形污秽清理干净，让它再次为帝国服务。就算你不打算将这艘被海盗劫持的船据为己有，也可以卖上一大笔钱，相信有很多买家对这艘船感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

traits.locale_text: “无心号是敌人的旗舰，遭到了异形技术的腐蚀。不过，您的王朝有足够的资源，可以将那些异形污秽清理干净，让它再次为帝国服务。就算你不打算将这艘被海盗劫持的船据为己有，也可以卖上一大笔钱，相信有很多买家对这艘船感兴趣。”

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur est le vaisseau amiral de l'ennemi. Une technologie inhumaine l'a corrompu, mais vous avez toutes les ressources nécessaires pour chasser la pourriture xénos et le rallier à nouveau à l'Imperium. Même si vous ne souhaitez pas devenir propriétaire d'un vaisseau ayant autrefois appartenu à des pirates, les acheteurs potentiels se bousculeront au portillon. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur est le vaisseau amiral de l'ennemi. Une technologie inhumaine l'a corrompu, mais vous avez toutes les ressources nécessaires pour chasser la pourriture xénos et le rallier à nouveau à l'Imperium. Même si vous ne souhaitez pas devenir propriétaire d'un vaisseau ayant autrefois appartenu à des pirates, les acheteurs potentiels se bousculeront au portillon. »

languages.text: 「ハートレスは敵の旗艦です。非人道的な技術に汚染されていますが、あなたには異種族の汚穢を浄化し、再び帝国に仕えさせるために必要な資源があります。海賊がかつて乗っていた船を所有したくないなら、購入希望者が列をなしてあなたの手から奪い取ろうとするでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスは敵の旗艦です。非人道的な技術に汚染されていますが、あなたには異種族の汚穢を浄化し、再び帝国に仕えさせるために必要な資源があります。海賊がかつて乗っていた船を所有したくないなら、購入希望者が列をなしてあなたの手から奪い取ろうとするでしょう」

languages.text: "Taşkalp, düşmanın sancak gemisidir. İnsan dışı teknolojilerle yozlaşmış olsa da onu zeno pisliğinden arındırımak ve yeniden İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmesini sağlamak için gerekli kaynaklar mevcut. Daha önce korsanların kullandığı bir gemiye sahip olmak istemezseniz de elimizden almak için sıraya girecek potansiyel alıcılar olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp, düşmanın sancak gemisidir. İnsan dışı teknolojilerle yozlaşmış olsa da onu zeno pisliğinden arındırımak ve yeniden İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmesini sağlamak için gerekli kaynaklar mevcut. Daha önce korsanların kullandığı bir gemiye sahip olmak istemezseniz de elimizden almak için sıraya girecek potansiyel alıcılar olacaktır."

languages.text: "Die Heartless ist das gegnerische Flaggschiff. Sie wurde von unmenschlicher Technologie korrumpiert, aber Ihr verfügt über die erforderlichen Ressourcen, um sie von Xenos-Abschaum zu säubern, damit sie dem Imperium erneut dienen kann. Selbst wenn Ihr kein Schiff besitzen wollt, das zuvor in Piratenbesitz war, werden potenzielle Käufer Schlange stehen und es Euch aus den Händen reißen."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is the enemy flagship. It has been corrupted with inhuman technology, but you have the necessary resources to purge it of xenos filth and make it serve the Imperium once more. Even if you don't wish to own a ship previously crewed by pirates, you will have prospective buyers lining up to take it off your hands."
